    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Admin
    Admin class represents an admin user in the payroll system Provides functionality to manage staff such as adding staff members, viewing staff details, and saving staff information to a CSV file
    CLI
     
    Employee
    The Employee class represents an employee in the payroll system, and Allows them to view their personal details and payslips
    EmployeeLoader
     
    FullTimeEmployee
     
    HR
    The HR class is responsible for handling human resources operations, including employee promotions Bnoth annual promotions for full-time employees and scale point promotions for part-time employees It also allows for manual promotion of employees to the next salary scale based on their time spent at the top of- Their payScale, and if they agree to such a promotion.
    PartTimeEmployee
     
    PayrollSystem
    The PayrollSystem class is responsible for handling payroll-related operations including adding pay claims, generating payslips, calculating tax, and saving payslips to a CSV file
    Payslip
    Represents a payslip for an employee containing details such as gross pay, tax, net pay, and the pay period.
    RunCLI
     
    ScaleLoader
    A class to load and manage scale data for employee titles, categories, and pay grades
    Staff
     
    StaffContainer
    A class to manage a collection of staff using a HashMap for fast lookup by staff ID
    StaffLoader
     
    TestRunner
